bill_title: accommodate legislation to improve municipal government.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to accommodate legislation to improve municipal government. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: In case a title to improve municipal government is needed to accommodate the legislative process, this bill is being introduced to accomplish that purpose. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
